verses.verse: THEN Bildad, the Shuhite, answered and said,
Dominion and reverence are with him, he has made peace in his heavens.
Is there any number to his armies? And upon whom does not his light shine?
How then can man be justified with God? Or how can he be declared blameless, he who is born of a woman?
Behold, even the moon cannot be justified; yea, the stars are not pure in his sight.
How much less man, who is dust, and the son of man, who is a worm!
